html:
** Shares of Peloton Interactive Inc PTON.O jump 9% with no clear catalyst, extending a recent bounce from lows not seen since May 2020

** PTON now up ~16% since Jan 5, but down almost 80% from record high close on Jan. 14, 2021, when the stock was soaring as the poster child of Wall Street's "stay at home" trade

** PTON's cratering stock price over past year makes the fitness bike seller more digestible by big tech or larger competitor looking to potentially acquire it, as has been speculated about since PTON's IPO in 2019

** PTON's market cap now equivalent to about 0.4% of Apple's AAPL.O, down from over 2% in Jan 2021. PTON market cap equivalent to 0.7% of Amazon AMZN.O, down from over 3% a year ago


** 31 analysts cover PTON, on avg rating it 'buy'. Its median PT is $71, which is 90% above its current price of $37.33


(Reporting by Noel Randewich)

(( noel.randewich@tr.com ; Twitter: https://twitter.com/randewich; ))
